meanings.definition: A marine echinoderm with a star-shaped body and typically five arms.
meanings.sent1: I saw a colorful starfish at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The starfish crawled slowly along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The starfish tried to high-five the crab but missed.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a bright starfish.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the vibrant starfish in the tide pool.

meanings.sent1: The Christmas tree topper was a beautiful starfish.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with a delicate starfish pendant.
meanings.sent3: The starfish on the wall glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a golden starfish.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a giant starfish on the ceiling of the museum.
